data.prayer: Jesus, call those who are far off in Zomba, Malawi, so that they and their family can receive life.
data.verse: For the promise is to you, and to your children, and to all who are far off, even as many as the Lord our God will call to himself.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Zomba, Malawi
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, we agree with your desire that the people in the state of Zomba hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.prayer: Spirit, please equip every disciple to make disciples who make disciples in the state of Zomba.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.prayer: Father, grace the churches in Zomba, Malawi with faithful local leaders.
data.verse: Where there is no guidance, a people falls, but in an abundance of counselors there is safety.

data.prayer: Lord, please remember the Kachchi people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.
Spirit, please defend the 14,050 believers in Zomba against self-centered spirituality. Open their eyes to the fields ripe for harvest around them.
Jesus, you are the great high priest, please make the 14,050 believers in Zomba, Malawi a worthy priesthood under you.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.section_summary:
the state of Zomba, Malawi has a population of 82,600.

We estimate Zomba has 14,050 people who might know Jesus, 48,464 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 20,086 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 5 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every believer in Zomba, Malawi to do the work of an evangelist with their friends and neighbors.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist
